name: Soup-a-scape!
description:
You find yourself trapped in a strange... soup themed realm!

Do you have what it takes to escape?

===================================================

This is my entry into the 2021 MS Paint Jam. All of the art was made using MS Paint and a mouse.

Pencil tool for life! :)

===================================================

Stuck?? Ask for help in the comments!

I hope you enjoy!!
